summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz)
Review Date: 2020/02/24
Store: GENTS OF LONDON
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'}
Review Text: I love this product, It makes my hair feel great without having that itchy feeling that other waxes and pastes give me. The scent is nice and fresh smelling which I personally haven't smelled before in a hair paste. The hold is quite good as well, I have really fine hair so it's really prone to showing my scalp in the wind. This is the first product I've used where my hair stays in place. Great paste!
Review Title: Smells and Feels Great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Smiclean Extra Soft Toothbrush with 10000 Micro-Nano bristles for Sensitive Teeth and Gums (20 Hole*2, Random Picture Color)
Review Date: 2020/12/29
Store: Ancmaple
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ancmaple', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft,Ultra Soft', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '7.48 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '769638831829', 'Manufacturer': 'Sanxiao group'}
Review Text: I have sensitive teeth and gums so I've been looking for a toothbrush that feels comfortable while also cleaning my teeth well. These brushes have me covered! They're soft and have thousands of tiny bristles all cleaning your mouth simultaneously! My mouth feels great and clean after every brushing, almost like I've just taken a shower! Build quality is pretty good for the asking price considering you get two and they do the job exceptionally! I can definitely recommend these brushes if you have sensitive teeth/gums or just want a great soft toothbrush!
Review Title: Great for Sensitive Teeth And Gums
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bold Men, Shampoo 250 ml- Mens Daily Shampoo (California Love)
Review Date: 2020/12/29
Store: BOLD MEN
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BOLD MEN', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Coarse, Curly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Liquid Volume': '250 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 7.48 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '793611800601'}
Review Text: I needed some shampoo so I went ahead and got the California Love scent over the Dark Grizzley as I prefer a more cologne like or fresh scent out of my shampoo and California Love sounded like it fit the profile a bit more. The bottle is medium sized and isn't too big so if you want to travel it would fit just fine in your luggage. The scent really gives me fruity notes. The closest thing I could compare it to is a strawberry pineapple combination, it smells really good! It feels great on your scalp as well, like it's cleaning better than it's competitors! I think it's definitely worth a buy if you're in the market for a new and pleasant smelling shampoo that cleans your hair and scalp well! My hair is really soft after using it!
Review Title: Feels and Smells Great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Cleanser Stick by Disco for Men, Hydrating, Removes Dirt and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2.12 Ounces
Review Date: 2021/06/09
Store: Hibeauty
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Brand': 'Hibeauty', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.78 x 1.85 x 1.77 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694710'}
Review Text: This Is the first product out of 5 in disco’s men’s facial care lineup. It is essentially a circular deodorant stick for your face. Just rub it on until your face is covered then wet your hands and massage the product into your face which will foam up. I usually like to massage the cleanser into my face for about 20-30 seconds before rinsing my face. My face feels nice and clean after using this. Because the 2nd and 3rd products are used 1-2x a week I usually go for the cleanser followed by the moisturizing product disco also makes once every night after a shower and it works great!
Review Title: Works Great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Scrub by Disco for Men, Exfoliating and Cleansing, Removes Dead Skin and Build Up, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces
Review Date: 2021/06/09
Store: Disco
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Disco', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.81 x 1.81 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694727'}
Review Text: The face scrub by disco is the 2nd step product in their men’s facial care lineup. It’s to be used 1-2x weekly and after you use their facial cleansing stick. While the cleanser cleans your face, the scrub exfoliates and removes dead skin and gunk out of your face, leaving you with a refreshing and hydrated feeling. I personally use it once a week after cleansing followed by the face mask that disco provides. I put a smudge on both sides of my cheeks and my forehead and slowly but gently rub it in. This particular product hurts a bit if you rub it in hard in my experience so I go nice and easy on my face while rubbing it in to stop any irritation from occurring. After about 30 seconds I rinse my face off with water and dry it with a dry and clean towel. The product works great in removing gunk from your face and will leave you feeling nice and fresh!
Review Title: Perfect for Exfoliating for Men!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Face Mask by Disco for Men, Detoxifying and Cleansing, All Natural and Paraben Free, 3.53 Ounces
Review Date: 2021/06/09
Store: Disco
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.99 x 1.93 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001694734'}
Review Text: The face mask by disco is the 3rd step product in their lineup for mens facial care. It’s to be used 1-2x weekly after using the facial scrub, then followed by their facial moisturizer! I personally like to use it once a week. After using their facial scrub, I go ahead and dry off my face then take a dab of the mask and rub it all over my face, except under my eyes, until my entire face is covered with the mask and then I wait for 15-20 minutes for it to dry off before putting my face under the faucet and wiping the mask off. After that, I just dry my face again and use disco’s facial moisturizer! The first few minutes after applying have a refreshing sting to it similar to mint gum, probably due to the Eucalyptus before the feeling goes away. My face feels great after using this product and I can easily recommend it!
Review Title: Feels Great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchasing behavior indicates a strong preference for personal grooming products, particularly in categories like hair styling, dental hygiene, and skincare. Consistently high ratings (4.0 to 5.0) reflect satisfaction with product performance and comfort, revealing a sentiment focused on effective solutions for specific needs, such as sensitivity in hair and teeth care.

Common themes include a desire for products that not only deliver excellent functionality but also offer appealing scents, such as aloe and eucalyptus. This reflects an appreciation for sensory experiences in personal care. Quality emerges as a significant factor, with preferences skewed toward well-reviewed, natural, and paraben-free items, highlighting a health-conscious mindset.

In terms of price sensitivity, the subject has shown willingness to invest in quality products that align with their needs, as indicated by favorable reviews of cost-effective multi-pack options and medium-sized bottles suitable for travel, suggesting practicality in purchasing.

Overall, core preferences point towards high-quality, effective grooming products that are gentle on sensitive skin and teeth, possess pleasant scents, and are reasonably priced, indicating a balanced approach to personal care and grooming.

target_interaction.title: Leaves Your Face Feeling Nice and Smooth!
target_interaction.text: This is the 4th step in disco’s line of men’s facial products. I use it everyday after using the facial cleansing stick and once a week I use it after using their facial mask. Just put a penny sized amount on your face, dab it on your cheeks and forehead, and rub it in! My face feels nice and smooth after using this and I can easily recommend it to anyone who is in the market to try out disco’s line of mens products or if you just need a good facial moisturizer!
target_interaction.title_meta: Face Moisturizer by Disco for Men, Hydrating, Anti-Aging Formula with Vitamin C, All Natural and Paraben Free, Eucalyptus Scent, 2 Ounces

videos.title: ELLI K Time Reverse Skin Care
